Pre-Game Insights: India and Afghanistan are set to face each other in the T20 World Cup Super Eight match on 20 June 2024 at Kensington Oval in Barbados.
India finished Group A as table toppers with seven points from four matches, including three wins and one washout.

Afghanistan secured their place in the Super Eight stage with clinical displays, including wins against Uganda, New Zealand, and Papua New Guinea, despite a loss to West Indies in their final group match.
Rishabh Pant and Suryakumar Yadav are key players for India, while Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's form and potential batting order changes are of interest.
The focus will be on India's spinners Kuldeep Yadav and Yuzvendra Chahal, and Afghanistan's match-winners Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Gulbadin Naib.
The match will be telecast on Star Sports Network TV channels and can be streamed live on Disney+Hotstar.
